alert.note: Alert for McCreary; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:26AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wayne and southwestern McCreary Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 624 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Slavens, or 9 miles west of Whitley City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Co-Operative and Marshes Siding around 630 AM EDT. Blue Heron and Stearns around 635 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Strunk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
